name: Girard Trust Company et al. v. Philadelphia et al., Appellants

judges: Before Kephart, C. J., Schaefer, Maxey, Drew, Linn, Stern and Barnes, JJ.
parties: Girard Trust Company et al. v. Philadelphia et al., Appellants.

opinions.text:
Per Curiam,
The decree of the court below is affirmed on the able opinion of the learned chancellor, Judge Alessandroni.
Decree affirmed.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: Samuel Feldman, Assistant City Solicitor, with him Joseph Sharfsin, City Solicitor, for appellants.
Charles J. Biddle and Lewis E. Van Dusen, Jr., for appellees, were not heard.
casebody.head_matter:
Girard Trust Company et al. v. Philadelphia et al., Appellants.
Argued December 8, 1939.
Before Kephart, C. J., Schaefer, Maxey, Drew, Linn, Stern and Barnes, JJ.
Samuel Feldman, Assistant City Solicitor, with him Joseph Sharfsin, City Solicitor, for appellants.
Charles J. Biddle and Lewis E. Van Dusen, Jr., for appellees, were not heard.
December 9, 1939:
